ezobject:attribute.name: Message
ezobject:attribute.text: I'm trying to set up EzPublish on a remote Linux host. The host has PHP safe mode set to 'on', and I'm trying to override that with a line in .htaccess in the root directory. My question is: How do I tell if the override is working? The installer, and phpinfo, are maintaining that safe mode is still on. Can I ignore that warning?

ezobject:attribute.name: Message
ezobject:attribute.text:
Hi,
has anyone tried to import a binary file?
I am trying to create objects which have a "file" attribute, which will hold some pdfs. I am unable to understand how to use the functions in ezbinaryfile.php and ezbinaryfiletype.php to obtain this.
